snippet: When a few Taxis of Tomorrow finally hit the streets of New York in October, they came with a much bolder logo, one as large as the wheels of the cabs themselves.
abstract: New and much bolder 'T' logo adorning Taxi of Tomorrow, small numbers of which finally hit streets of New York City in October, is third in six years for fleet that for its first century, was without any logo at all; future of new cabs is in question, still mired in legal battles over whether city exceeded its authority in devising plan.
lead_paragraph: When a few Taxis of Tomorrow finally hit the streets of New York in October, they came with a much bolder logo, one as large as the wheels of the cabs themselves.

headline.main: New, Bigger and Bolder ‘T’ Logo Adorns a ‘Model Cab’ That Has an Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: New, Bigger and Bolder ‘T’ Logo Adorns a ‘Model Cab’ That Has an Uncertain Future
